sub_title: Functional Safety Manager at German LNG Terminal GmbH
summary:
Currently looking for a position within an oil and gas upstream projects in an international work environment. Working abroad is not a problem.

I have over 30 years of experience within the engineering and construction industry with owner companies and contractors in the oil and gas sector both on and offshore. My work history includes projects in countries in Europe, Africa, Asia and the Middle East.
The positions assumed, covered responsibility in project management, engineering, construction and operations with both contractor and client organization.

Specialties: Extensive knowledge and experience with:
Development and implementation of Process Control Systems (ICSS or DCS/ESD/F&G) and associated field instruments of various manufacturers (e.g. Honeywell, ABB and Yokogawa), European High and Low voltage installations and applied regulations, Explosion proof and Intrinsically safe systems and regulations (ATEX). Strong knowledge of HAZID, HAZOP, FAT, RBA, RBI, PCA, FMECA and 3D modeling.
